name: Repairing Earth
description:
We recommend that you fullscreen the game for the proper experience if playing it in the browser :)

Created as part of Global Game Jam 2020

A future Earth has been destroyed by the folly of humanity. Now, in the year 2200, humans from an interplanetary colony have developed the technology to restore it to its former glory.

Design and Programming:  

Ethan Shellard[https://ethanjshellard.itch.io/] and Dominique Russell [https://dominiquer.itch.io/]    

Art:  

Dominique Russell [https://dominiquer.itch.io/]    

Font:  

Blok Font, Tup Wanders [http://www.tupwanders.nl]    

Music:  

Tentacle Wedding, RomarioGrande [https://freesound.org/people/Romariogrande/sounds/396231/]    

SFX:

Boom, cabled_mess [https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/350976/]  

Warping, LloydEvans09 [https://freesound.org/people/LloydEvans09/sounds/185849/]  

OneBeep, kwahmah_02 [https://freesound.org/people/kwahmah_02/sounds/259703/]  

Lightbutton, Ryding [https://freesound.org/people/Ryding/sounds/109186/]
